name: Lightcloud-Blue
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Lightcloud Blue skills offer the convenient voice-control experience using Alexa. To start, you’ll need to pair and configure your lighting devices and Lightcloud Blue Nano using the Lightcloud Blue mobile app. Lightcloud Blue skill functionality is only available when using the Lightcloud Blue Nano. Next, click the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your Lightcloud Blue account.

Using the Area and Scene names that you setup on the Lightcloud Blue mobile app, you can control your lighting with only a few words.

Examples of Lightcloud Blue skills to try:

ON/OFF
Simple on/off functionality available for a single Area or multiple Areas.
Alexa, turn on/off all lights.
Alexa, turn on/off Living Room lights.

DIM LEVEL CONTROL
Manage the brightness of lighting based on the activity.
Alexa, turn on/dim Living Room lights to 50 percent.
Alexa, dim Bedroom lights 25 percent.

COLOR CONTROL
Create a comfortable atmosphere by adjusting the color temperature.
Alexa, make the Living Room light warm white.
Alexa, set the Kitchen light to daylight.

SCENES
Enable pre-configured Scenes by telling Alexa the name of the Scene.
Alexa, turn on Good Night.
Alexa, turn on Movie Night.
